type: TS LF Trading Bot Error - Maximum Balance Reached

definition.text: The execution of the Trading System was halted because the maximun balance configured was reached.

paragraphs.text: You are allowed to configure at the Session Base Asset and Session Quoted Asset nodes a maximum balance. If you do that -- because it is optional -- the LF Trading Bot will check at every candle during the Trading Simulation that the balance has not reached that maximum. If it does, this error is triggered and the Trading System stops it's execution inmediatelly.
